name: Asteroid Defense (MSixteenI6, GameZgirl)
description:
Asteroid Defense was created by Morgan and Dylan in a self-imposed 72 consecutive-hour time limit with the random theme “Infinite Loop”. This ever-circulating shooter has you protecting your planet from being destroyed from an onslaught of asteroids. You must destroy the asteroids with your spaceship’s lasers before they enter your planet's atmosphere and cause irreparable damage!

A or <-  = move left

D or ->  = move right

Spacebar  = shoots

Escape or P  = Pause
